tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SoilNutrientAndCropYield (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    nutrient_level FLOAT,
    yield_per_acre FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE soil_nutrient_levels (
  soil_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  nitrogen_level FLOAT,
  phosphorus_level FLOAT,
  potassium_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE crop_yield_data (
  crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(50),
  yield_amount FLOAT,
  yield_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE field_locations (
  field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT,
  field_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE crop_rotation (
  rotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id INT,
  previous_crop_id INT,
  rotation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE SoilNutrientLevels (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location TEXT,
  nitrogen FLOAT,
  phosphorus FLOAT,
  potassium FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE CropYields (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name TEXT,
  yield FLOAT,
  season TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE FieldData (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  field_name TEXT,
  crop_id UUID,
  nutrient_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE NutrientRecommendations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id UUID,
  nutrient_type TEXT,
  recommended_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT
)
